## Discussion

You are responsible for ensuring the usage and pixel format of the texture you assign to this property matches the texture usage [doc://com.apple.metalfx/documentation/MetalFX/MTLFXFrameInterpolatorBase/colorTextureUsage] requests and the pixel format that [doc://com.apple.metalfx/documentation/MetalFX/MTLFXFrameInterpolatorBase/colorTextureFormat] requests.

# colorTexture

**Instance Property**

The color texture that this frame interpolator evaluates.

## Declaration

```swift
var colorTexture: (any MTLTexture)? { get set }
```

## Discussion

You are responsible for ensuring the usage and pixel format of the texture you assign to this property matches the texture usage [doc://com.apple.metalfx/documentation/MetalFX/MTLFXFrameInterpolatorBase/colorTextureUsage] requests and the pixel format that [doc://com.apple.metalfx/documentation/MetalFX/MTLFXFrameInterpolatorBase/colorTextureFormat] requests.
title: colorTexture
